metadata.title: Chat with Us
metadata.description: Get instant answers to your questions through our AI-powered chat

chat.heading: Chat with Our Assistant
chat.subheading: Get quick answers to your questions
chat.description: Our AI assistant is here to help you with any questions you might have about our services, products, or how to get started.
chat.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your virtual assistant. How can I help you today?

booking.text: I'd like to book a consultation
